content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":260632,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイを恐れてみんな逃げ惑い、それに巻き込まれて倒れたメアリー、気まぐれで助け起こすレイとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone panicked and fled in fear of Rei, and Mary, caught up in it, collapsed; Rei whimsically helped her up."},{"lineNumber":260633,"originalJapaneseLine":"※これは、カスタムルート、ジフテリアルート、共通","translatedEnglishLine":"*This is common to the Custom Route and Diphtheria Route."},{"lineNumber":260634,"originalJapaneseLine":"カスタムの町が見えた","translatedEnglishLine":"The town of Custom came into view."},{"lineNumber":260635,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍に占領されていないという話だったが、魔軍がいるようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"We heard it hadn’t been occupied by the demon army, but it seems the demon army is here."},{"lineNumber":260636,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、数はあまりない。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, their numbers aren’t many."},{"lineNumber":260637,"originalJapaneseLine":"１個中隊ぐらいか・・かなみ等の偵察で分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"About the size of one company... Kanami and others confirmed this by reconnaissance."},{"lineNumber":260638,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら俺達の数倍程度だ、押し切れるな、全滅させるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Then they’re only a few times our number, we can overwhelm them and annihilate them."},{"lineNumber":260639,"originalJapaneseLine":"突撃開始ー","translatedEnglishLine":"Charge start—"},{"lineNumber":260640,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物が・・ん、人間だー、迎撃しろー","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters... Hm, they're humans! Intercept them!"},{"lineNumber":260641,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":260642,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーし、だいたい殲滅したかな。一部逃げたようだが無視していいだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, we’ve pretty much wiped them out. Some seem to have escaped, but we can ignore them."},{"lineNumber":260643,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスが気になっている、おかしいな・・魔人の気配が少ししたのだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos seems concerned. Strange... I felt a slight presence of a demon lord."},{"lineNumber":260644,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアがたったっと走っていく、こらまて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria quickly runs off. Hey, wait..."},{"lineNumber":260645,"originalJapaneseLine":"町の一角にある工場に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"She enters a factory in a corner of the town."},{"lineNumber":260646,"originalJapaneseLine":"製造中の１２台の３号Ｈ型が並んでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Twelve Type-3 H-models under production are lined up."},{"lineNumber":260647,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほっ、よかった魔物に壊されていない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew, good, they haven’t been destroyed by monsters."},{"lineNumber":260648,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれこれ調べた後、とにかく動くだけなら１時間も整備したらいけると思う。","translatedEnglishLine":"After checking various things, I think if it’s just moving, an hour of maintenance should suffice."},{"lineNumber":260649,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しまっていてねーとランスに言うと部下達（香澄はリーザスに派遣されているので居ません）に命じて作業開始","translatedEnglishLine":"I told Lance to wait a moment and ordered the subordinates (Kasumi is dispatched to Liesath, so she isn’t here) to begin work."},{"lineNumber":260650,"originalJapaneseLine":"忙し忙しと走り回るマリア、きゃっと驚く、奥に置いていたチューリップ３号の中から少年が出てきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria busily runs around. Suddenly, a boy emerges from the Tulip No.3 placed in the back."},{"lineNumber":260651,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールである　カオスはやっぱり魔人がいたと叫ぶ、うーん、ちょっと風邪気味だったのか分かりにくかったわいとか","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s Paiar. Chaos shouts that there really was a demon lord. Hmm, maybe I had a slight cold; it was hard to tell."},{"lineNumber":260652,"originalJapaneseLine":"私のチューリップ３号に何しているのよとマリア喧嘩腰","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria confronts sharply, \"What are you doing to my Tulip No.3?\""},{ "lineNumber":260653,"originalJapaneseLine":"へぇ、これ君が作ったんだ、人間にしてはすごいね。面白い物があるからと言われて見にきていたんだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, you made this? That's impressive for a human. I came to see it because I heard there's something interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":260654,"originalJapaneseLine":"技術的にはあまりにも幼稚で見る所なんてないけど、発想がいいね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Technically it’s too primitive and there's not much to see, but the concept is good."},{"lineNumber":260655,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大砲と装甲と自走部分だけか、単純な動きしか出来ないけどなるほどな、ちょっとマネてみようかな","translatedEnglishLine":"So it’s just cannon, armor, and propulsion parts. It can only do simple movements, but I see, maybe I’ll try to imitate it a bit."},{"lineNumber":260656,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな割り切った作り思いもつかなかったよ","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought of such a straightforward design."},{"lineNumber":260657,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアをバカにした口調、口げんかになる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The tone belittles Maria, leading to a verbal quarrel."},{"lineNumber":260658,"originalJapaneseLine":"えらそうな事をいって貴方は何が作れるのよと挑発すると","translatedEnglishLine":"When Maria provocatively asks, \"You say big words, but what can you make?\""},{"lineNumber":260659,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぞろぞろと後ろから数体のロボットが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Several robots appeared from behind in a crowd."},{"lineNumber":260660,"originalJapaneseLine":"うっ・・なにそれ、強そうとマリア","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... what is that? It looks strong,\" said Maria."},{"lineNumber":260661,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスが、えーい、とにかく倒せ、奴は魔人だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos shouts, \"Hey! Just take him down, he's a demon lord!\""},{ "lineNumber":260662,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":260663,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　この戦闘はＰＤ数体だけでパイアールはいません","translatedEnglishLine":"> This battle involves only a few PDs; Paiar is not present."},{"lineNumber":260664,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＰＤとの戦闘中の割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle with PDs."},{"lineNumber":260665,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアも戦っている、チューリップ１号とか使って","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria is also fighting, using Tulip No. 1 and such."},{"lineNumber":260666,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＰＤを見て、なにこれ・・ポピンズのカラクリとも違うし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at the PD, 'What is this? It’s different from the Poppins mechanism...'"},{"lineNumber":260667,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちゃんと考えている動いているの？すごい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it properly thinking and moving? Amazing..."},{"lineNumber":260668,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・昔作ったカンパンの進化形だろか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... could this be an evolved form of the Kanpan I made long ago...?"},{"lineNumber":260669,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな事を考えながら戦っていると戦闘で空いた穴に落ちてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"While thinking that, during the fight, I fell into a hole opened by the battle."},{"lineNumber":260670,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが、あわてて手を伸ばすか間に合わない","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance hurriedly reached out his hand, but it was too late."},{"lineNumber":260671,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひゅーんと落ちていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoosh, falling down."},{"lineNumber":260672,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかＰＤを倒した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, I defeated the PD."},{"lineNumber":260673,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、おい・・パイアールは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos: \"Hey... what about Paiar...?\""},{ "lineNumber":260674,"originalJapaneseLine":"逃げられたか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Did he escape...?"},{"lineNumber":260675,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、マリアだ、確かその辺の穴に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, it’s Maria. She definitely fell into a hole around there..."},{"lineNumber":260676,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここの穴に落ちたのだわ、あっ・・これ","translatedEnglishLine":"She fell into this hole. Ah... this."},{"lineNumber":260677,"originalJapaneseLine":"昔、志津香が町を沈めて作った地下迷宮だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the underground labyrinth Shizuka created when she sank the town long ago."},{"lineNumber":260678,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time."},{"lineNumber":260679,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリア視点のシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Scene from Maria's perspective."},{"lineNumber":260680,"originalJapaneseLine":"落ちたマリア、いてて・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria who fell: 'Ouch...'"},{"lineNumber":260681,"originalJapaneseLine":"だいぶ落ちたけど、下にベッドがあって助かった","translatedEnglishLine":"I fell quite far, but there was a bed below, so I was saved."},{"lineNumber":260682,"originalJapaneseLine":"古びた民家みたい・・ここ","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like an old farmhouse... here."},{"lineNumber":260683,"originalJapaneseLine":"４メールほど上の方に穴が見える、ときどき光ったして戦っている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"About 4 meters above, I can see a hole; sometimes there’s a flash of light and signs of fighting."},{"lineNumber":260684,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやってもどろうかしらと思っていたら","translatedEnglishLine":"I was thinking about how to get back when—"},{"lineNumber":260685,"originalJapaneseLine":"ろるんたが３体ほど現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"About three Roluntas appeared."},{"lineNumber":260686,"originalJapaneseLine":"モンスター、えっと・・チューリップどこ・・ない、逃げないと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters... um... where's the Tulip... it’s not here, I have to run..."},{"lineNumber":260687,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"....."},{"lineNumber":260688,"originalJapaneseLine":"暗闇の迷宮を走り回って逃げて行くと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Running through the dark labyrinth to escape..."},{"lineNumber":260689,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここでダークランスと出会います、ダークランスに助けられる","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, I meet Dark Lance and am saved by him."},{"lineNumber":260690,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人のちょっとした会話","translatedEnglishLine":"A brief conversation between the two."},{"lineNumber":260691,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここ１つのイベントですが、必要なら　マリアとダークランスの冒険で","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a single event, but if needed, it could be part of Maria and Dark Lance’s adventure."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイを恐れてみんな逃げ惑い、それに巻き込まれて倒れたメアリー、気まぐれで助け起こすレイとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone panicked and fled in fear of Rei, and Mary, caught up in it, collapsed; Rei whimsically helped her up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※これは、カスタムルート、ジフテリアルート、共通
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *This is common to the Custom Route and Diphtheria Route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムの町が見えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town of Custom came into view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されていないという話だったが、魔軍がいるようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We heard it hadn’t been occupied by the demon army, but it seems the demon army is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、数はあまりない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, their numbers aren’t many.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １個中隊ぐらいか・・かなみ等の偵察で分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About the size of one company... Kanami and others confirmed this by reconnaissance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら俺達の数倍程度だ、押し切れるな、全滅させるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then they’re only a few times our number, we can overwhelm them and annihilate them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃開始ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Charge start—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物が・・ん、人間だー、迎撃しろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters... Hm, they're humans! Intercept them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、だいたい殲滅したかな。一部逃げたようだが無視していいだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we’ve pretty much wiped them out. Some seem to have escaped, but we can ignore them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが気になっている、おかしいな・・魔人の気配が少ししたのだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos seems concerned. Strange... I felt a slight presence of a demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアがたったっと走っていく、こらまて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria quickly runs off. Hey, wait...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町の一角にある工場に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She enters a factory in a corner of the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 製造中の１２台の３号Ｈ型が並んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Twelve Type-3 H-models under production are lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっ、よかった魔物に壊されていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, good, they haven’t been destroyed by monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれこれ調べた後、とにかく動くだけなら１時間も整備したらいけると思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After checking various things, I think if it’s just moving, an hour of maintenance should suffice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しまっていてねーとランスに言うと部下達（香澄はリーザスに派遣されているので居ません）に命じて作業開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told Lance to wait a moment and ordered the subordinates (Kasumi is dispatched to Liesath, so she isn’t here) to begin work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙し忙しと走り回るマリア、きゃっと驚く、奥に置いていたチューリップ３号の中から少年が出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria busily runs around. Suddenly, a boy emerges from the Tulip No.3 placed in the back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールである　カオスはやっぱり魔人がいたと叫ぶ、うーん、ちょっと風邪気味だったのか分かりにくかったわいとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s Paiar. Chaos shouts that there really was a demon lord. Hmm, maybe I had a slight cold; it was hard to tell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私のチューリップ３号に何しているのよとマリア喧嘩腰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria confronts sharply, "What are you doing to my Tulip No.3?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へぇ、これ君が作ったんだ、人間にしてはすごいね。面白い物があるからと言われて見にきていたんだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you made this? That's impressive for a human. I came to see it because I heard there's something interesting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 技術的にはあまりにも幼稚で見る所なんてないけど、発想がいいね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Technically it’s too primitive and there's not much to see, but the concept is good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大砲と装甲と自走部分だけか、単純な動きしか出来ないけどなるほどな、ちょっとマネてみようかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it’s just cannon, armor, and propulsion parts. It can only do simple movements, but I see, maybe I’ll try to imitate it a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな割り切った作り思いもつかなかったよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought of such a straightforward design.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアをバカにした口調、口げんかになる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tone belittles Maria, leading to a verbal quarrel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えらそうな事をいって貴方は何が作れるのよと挑発すると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Maria provocatively asks, "You say big words, but what can you make?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞろぞろと後ろから数体のロボットが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several robots appeared from behind in a crowd.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっ・・なにそれ、強そうとマリア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... what is that? It looks strong," said Maria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが、えーい、とにかく倒せ、奴は魔人だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos shouts, "Hey! Just take him down, he's a demon lord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　この戦闘はＰＤ数体だけでパイアールはいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > This battle involves only a few PDs; Paiar is not present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤとの戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle with PDs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアも戦っている、チューリップ１号とか使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is also fighting, using Tulip No. 1 and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤを見て、なにこれ・・ポピンズのカラクリとも違うし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the PD, 'What is this? It’s different from the Poppins mechanism...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと考えている動いているの？すごい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it properly thinking and moving? Amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・昔作ったカンパンの進化形だろか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... could this be an evolved form of the Kanpan I made long ago...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな事を考えながら戦っていると戦闘で空いた穴に落ちてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While thinking that, during the fight, I fell into a hole opened by the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが、あわてて手を伸ばすか間に合わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance hurriedly reached out his hand, but it was too late.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひゅーんと落ちていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoosh, falling down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかＰＤを倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, I defeated the PD.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、おい・・パイアールは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos: "Hey... what about Paiar...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げられたか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did he escape...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、マリアだ、確かその辺の穴に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, it’s Maria. She definitely fell into a hole around there...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここの穴に落ちたのだわ、あっ・・これ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She fell into this hole. Ah... this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔、志津香が町を沈めて作った地下迷宮だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the underground labyrinth Shizuka created when she sank the town long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア視点のシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene from Maria's perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちたマリア、いてて・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria who fell: 'Ouch...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶ落ちたけど、下にベッドがあって助かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I fell quite far, but there was a bed below, so I was saved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 古びた民家みたい・・ここ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like an old farmhouse... here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４メールほど上の方に穴が見える、ときどき光ったして戦っている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 4 meters above, I can see a hole; sometimes there’s a flash of light and signs of fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやってもどろうかしらと思っていたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking about how to get back when—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ろるんたが３体ほど現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About three Roluntas appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスター、えっと・・チューリップどこ・・ない、逃げないと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters... um... where's the Tulip... it’s not here, I have to run...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗闇の迷宮を走り回って逃げて行くと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Running through the dark labyrinth to escape...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでダークランスと出会います、ダークランスに助けられる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, I meet Dark Lance and am saved by him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人のちょっとした会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brief conversation between the two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ１つのイベントですが、必要なら　マリアとダークランスの冒険で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a single event, but if needed, it could be part of Maria and Dark Lance’s adventure.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Suddenly, a boy emerges from the Tulip No.3 placed in the back."},{"lineNumber":260651,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールである　カオスはやっぱり魔人がいたと叫ぶ、うーん、ちょっと風邪気味だったのか分かりにくかったわいとか","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s Paiar. Chaos shouts that there really was a demon lord. Hmm, maybe I had a slight cold; it was hard to tell."},{"lineNumber":260652,"originalJapaneseLine":"私のチューリップ３号に何しているのよとマリア喧嘩腰","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria confronts sharply, \"What are you doing to my Tulip No.3?\""},{ "lineNumber":260653,"originalJapaneseLine":"へぇ、これ君が作ったんだ、人間にしてはすごいね。面白い物があるからと言われて見にきていたんだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, you made this? That's impressive for a human. I came to see it because I heard there's something interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":260654,"originalJapaneseLine":"技術的にはあまりにも幼稚で見る所なんてないけど、発想がいいね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Technically it’s too primitive and there's not much to see, but the concept is good."},{"lineNumber":260655,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大砲と装甲と自走部分だけか、単純な動きしか出来ないけどなるほどな、ちょっとマネてみようかな","translatedEnglishLine":"So it’s just cannon, armor, and propulsion parts. It can only do simple movements, but I see, maybe I’ll try to imitate it a bit."},{"lineNumber":260656,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな割り切った作り思いもつかなかったよ","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought of such a straightforward design."},{"lineNumber":260657,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアをバカにした口調、口げんかになる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The tone belittles Maria, leading to a verbal quarrel."},{"lineNumber":260658,"originalJapaneseLine":"えらそうな事をいって貴方は何が作れるのよと挑発すると","translatedEnglishLine":"When Maria provocatively asks, \"You say big words, but what can you make?\""},{"lineNumber":260659,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぞろぞろと後ろから数体のロボットが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Several robots appeared from behind in a crowd."},{"lineNumber":260660,"originalJapaneseLine":"うっ・・なにそれ、強そうとマリア","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... what is that? It looks strong,\" said Maria."},{"lineNumber":260661,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスが、えーい、とにかく倒せ、奴は魔人だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos shouts, \"Hey! Just take him down, he's a demon lord!\""},{ "lineNumber":260662,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":260663,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　この戦闘はＰＤ数体だけでパイアールはいません","translatedEnglishLine":"> This battle involves only a few PDs; Paiar is not present."},{"lineNumber":260664,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＰＤとの戦闘中の割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle with PDs."},{"lineNumber":260665,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアも戦っている、チューリップ１号とか使って","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria is also fighting, using Tulip No. 1 and such."},{"lineNumber":260666,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＰＤを見て、なにこれ・・ポピンズのカラクリとも違うし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at the PD, 'What is this? Amazing..."},{"lineNumber":260668,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・昔作ったカンパンの進化形だろか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... could this be an evolved form of the Kanpan I made long ago...?"},{"lineNumber":260669,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな事を考えながら戦っていると戦闘で空いた穴に落ちてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"While thinking that, during the fight, I fell into a hole opened by the battle."},{"lineNumber":260670,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが、あわてて手を伸ばすか間に合わない","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance hurriedly reached out his hand, but it was too late."},{"lineNumber":260671,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひゅーんと落ちていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoosh, falling down."},{"lineNumber":260672,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかＰＤを倒した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, I defeated the PD."},{"lineNumber":260673,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、おい・・パイアールは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos: \"Hey... what about Paiar...?\""},{ "lineNumber":260674,"originalJapaneseLine":"逃げられたか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Did he escape...?"},{"lineNumber":260675,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、マリアだ、確かその辺の穴に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, it’s Maria. She definitely fell into a hole around there..."},{"lineNumber":260676,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここの穴に落ちたのだわ、あっ・・これ","translatedEnglishLine":"She fell into this hole. Ah... this."},{"lineNumber":260677,"originalJapaneseLine":"昔、志津香が町を沈めて作った地下迷宮だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the underground labyrinth Shizuka created when she sank the town long ago."},{"lineNumber":260678,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time."},{"lineNumber":260679,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリア視点のシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Scene from Maria's perspective."},{"lineNumber":260680,"originalJapaneseLine":"落ちたマリア、いてて・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria who fell: 'Ouch...'"},{"lineNumber":260681,"originalJapaneseLine":"だいぶ落ちたけど、下にベッドがあって助かった","translatedEnglishLine":"I fell quite far, but there was a bed below, so I was saved."},{"lineNumber":260682,"originalJapaneseLine":"古びた民家みたい・・ここ","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like an old farmhouse... here."},{"lineNumber":260683,"originalJapaneseLine":"４メールほど上の方に穴が見える、ときどき光ったして戦っている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"About 4 meters above, I can see a hole; sometimes there’s a flash of light and signs of fighting."},{"lineNumber":260684,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやってもどろうかしらと思っていたら","translatedEnglishLine":"I was thinking about how to get back when—"},{"lineNumber":260685,"originalJapaneseLine":"ろるんたが３体ほど現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"About three Roluntas appeared."},{"lineNumber":260686,"originalJapaneseLine":"モンスター、えっと・・チューリップどこ・・ない、逃げないと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters... um... where's the Tulip... it’s not here, I have to run..."},{"lineNumber":260687,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"....."},{"lineNumber":260688,"originalJapaneseLine":"暗闇の迷宮を走り回って逃げて行くと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Running through the dark labyrinth to escape..."},{"lineNumber":260689,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここでダークランスと出会います、ダークランスに助けられる","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, I meet Dark Lance and am saved by him."},{"lineNumber":260690,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人のちょっとした会話","translatedEnglishLine":"A brief conversation between the two."},{"lineNumber":260691,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここ１つのイベントですが、必要なら　マリアとダークランスの冒険で","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a single event, but if needed, it could be part of Maria and Dark Lance’s adventure."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイを恐れてみんな逃げ惑い、それに巻き込まれて倒れたメアリー、気まぐれで助け起こすレイとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone panicked and fled in fear of Rei, and Mary, caught up in it, collapsed; Rei whimsically helped her up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※これは、カスタムルート、ジフテリアルート、共通
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *This is common to the Custom Route and Diphtheria Route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムの町が見えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town of Custom came into view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されていないという話だったが、魔軍がいるようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We heard it hadn’t been occupied by the demon army, but it seems the demon army is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、数はあまりない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, their numbers aren’t many.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １個中隊ぐらいか・・かなみ等の偵察で分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About the size of one company... Kanami and others confirmed this by reconnaissance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら俺達の数倍程度だ、押し切れるな、全滅させるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then they’re only a few times our number, we can overwhelm them and annihilate them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃開始ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Charge start—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物が・・ん、人間だー、迎撃しろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters... Hm, they're humans! Intercept them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、だいたい殲滅したかな。一部逃げたようだが無視していいだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we’ve pretty much wiped them out. Some seem to have escaped, but we can ignore them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが気になっている、おかしいな・・魔人の気配が少ししたのだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos seems concerned. Strange... I felt a slight presence of a demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアがたったっと走っていく、こらまて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria quickly runs off. Hey, wait...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町の一角にある工場に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She enters a factory in a corner of the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 製造中の１２台の３号Ｈ型が並んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Twelve Type-3 H-models under production are lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっ、よかった魔物に壊されていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, good, they haven’t been destroyed by monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれこれ調べた後、とにかく動くだけなら１時間も整備したらいけると思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After checking various things, I think if it’s just moving, an hour of maintenance should suffice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しまっていてねーとランスに言うと部下達（香澄はリーザスに派遣されているので居ません）に命じて作業開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told Lance to wait a moment and ordered the subordinates (Kasumi is dispatched to Liesath, so she isn’t here) to begin work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙し忙しと走り回るマリア、きゃっと驚く、奥に置いていたチューリップ３号の中から少年が出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria busily runs around. Suddenly, a boy emerges from the Tulip No.3 placed in the back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールである　カオスはやっぱり魔人がいたと叫ぶ、うーん、ちょっと風邪気味だったのか分かりにくかったわいとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s Paiar. Chaos shouts that there really was a demon lord. Hmm, maybe I had a slight cold; it was hard to tell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私のチューリップ３号に何しているのよとマリア喧嘩腰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria confronts sharply, "What are you doing to my Tulip No.3?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へぇ、これ君が作ったんだ、人間にしてはすごいね。面白い物があるからと言われて見にきていたんだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you made this? That's impressive for a human. I came to see it because I heard there's something interesting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 技術的にはあまりにも幼稚で見る所なんてないけど、発想がいいね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Technically it’s too primitive and there's not much to see, but the concept is good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大砲と装甲と自走部分だけか、単純な動きしか出来ないけどなるほどな、ちょっとマネてみようかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it’s just cannon, armor, and propulsion parts. It can only do simple movements, but I see, maybe I’ll try to imitate it a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな割り切った作り思いもつかなかったよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought of such a straightforward design.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアをバカにした口調、口げんかになる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tone belittles Maria, leading to a verbal quarrel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えらそうな事をいって貴方は何が作れるのよと挑発すると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Maria provocatively asks, "You say big words, but what can you make?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞろぞろと後ろから数体のロボットが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several robots appeared from behind in a crowd.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっ・・なにそれ、強そうとマリア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... what is that? It looks strong," said Maria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが、えーい、とにかく倒せ、奴は魔人だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos shouts, "Hey! Just take him down, he's a demon lord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　この戦闘はＰＤ数体だけでパイアールはいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > This battle involves only a few PDs; Paiar is not present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤとの戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle with PDs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアも戦っている、チューリップ１号とか使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is also fighting, using Tulip No. 1 and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤを見て、なにこれ・・ポピンズのカラクリとも違うし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the PD, 'What is this? It’s different from the Poppins mechanism...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと考えている動いているの？すごい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it properly thinking and moving? Amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・昔作ったカンパンの進化形だろか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... could this be an evolved form of the Kanpan I made long ago...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな事を考えながら戦っていると戦闘で空いた穴に落ちてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While thinking that, during the fight, I fell into a hole opened by the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが、あわてて手を伸ばすか間に合わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance hurriedly reached out his hand, but it was too late.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひゅーんと落ちていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoosh, falling down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかＰＤを倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, I defeated the PD.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、おい・・パイアールは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos: "Hey... what about Paiar...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げられたか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did he escape...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、マリアだ、確かその辺の穴に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, it’s Maria. She definitely fell into a hole around there...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここの穴に落ちたのだわ、あっ・・これ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She fell into this hole. Ah... this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔、志津香が町を沈めて作った地下迷宮だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the underground labyrinth Shizuka created when she sank the town long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア視点のシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene from Maria's perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちたマリア、いてて・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria who fell: 'Ouch...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶ落ちたけど、下にベッドがあって助かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I fell quite far, but there was a bed below, so I was saved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 古びた民家みたい・・ここ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like an old farmhouse... here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４メールほど上の方に穴が見える、ときどき光ったして戦っている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 4 meters above, I can see a hole; sometimes there’s a flash of light and signs of fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやってもどろうかしらと思っていたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking about how to get back when—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ろるんたが３体ほど現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About three Roluntas appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスター、えっと・・チューリップどこ・・ない、逃げないと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters... um... where's the Tulip... it’s not here, I have to run...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗闇の迷宮を走り回って逃げて行くと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Running through the dark labyrinth to escape...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでダークランスと出会います、ダークランスに助けられる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, I meet Dark Lance and am saved by him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人のちょっとした会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brief conversation between the two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ１つのイベントですが、必要なら　マリアとダークランスの冒険で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a single event, but if needed, it could be part of Maria and Dark Lance’s adventure.
